title: Model Name Shows Mock Value in Production Reports
description: When running with real DeepWiki API, the report still shows 'mock/MOCK-MODEL-NOT-FROM-SUPABASE' instead of the actual model used (e.g., 'gpt-4o').
expectedBehavior: Should display actual model name used (e.g., 'gpt-4o', 'gpt-4-turbo')
